name: MessageFactoryTest
description: Unit tests for creating various types of STUN messages using the MessageFactory.

test_cases.name: testCreateBindingErrorResponse
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a binding error response with a specific error code.

test_cases.name: testCreateBindingErrorResponse1
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a binding error response with a specific error code and reason phrase.

test_cases.name: testCreateBindingErrorResponseUnknownAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a binding error response with unknown attributes.

test_cases.name: testCreateBindingErrorResponseUnknownAttributes1
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a binding error response with a specific reason phrase and unknown attributes.

test_cases.name: testCreateBindingRequest
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a binding request.

test_cases.name: testCreateBindingResponse
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a binding success response with mapped, source, and changed addresses.
